title: Large Letter Postcard Font
content:
Does anyone know where I can find the fonts found in these vintage postcards at this link: [http://www.creativepro.com/article/heavy-metal-madness-greetings-from-bi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008164219/http:/www.creativepro.com/article/heavy-metal-madness-greetings-from-big-letters-usa "http://www.creativepro.com/article/heavy-metal-madness-greetings-from-big-letters-usa")

Scroll down on the link to see the images.

Thanks!
author: shereney

comments.content: Those are all hand rendered type.

I know the fonts were hand rendered, that's what the article is about, after all.

But, I was wondering if anyone knows of fonts out there that are in that style or have that look and feel?
